headline: Jim Cramer Highlights DaVita’s Massive Buybacks Yet Stays Cautious
summary: DaVita Inc. (NYSE:DVA) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer highlighted recently. Cramer called its share buybacks over the last decade “big,” as he remarked: “So which of his (Goldman Sachs analyst David Kostin) buyback aristocrats are the best of the best? Now this is what I like to do because I am a stock […]
